subject: Urgent: Your account has been limited
body:
Dear customer, we've noticed suspicious activity on your account. To prevent unauthorized access, we have temporarily limited your account. Please click the link below to verify your identity.

[Verify Now: http://secure-paypal-login.net/auth]
indicators: Sender domain 'pay-pal-alert.com' is not official paypal.com

subject: Microsoft account unusual sign-in activity
body:
We detected an unusual sign-in attempt from a new location (IP: 192.168.1.1, Moscow). If this was you, you can safely ignore this email. If not, please review your activity.

Review: https://account.microsoft.com/activity
indicators: No immediate threat or demand for password
Link leads to legitimate microsoft.com domain

subject: Payment Declined - Update your payment method
body:
We're having some trouble with your current billing information. Your membership will be cancelled if you do not update your payment details immediately.

[Update Payment: http://billing-netflix.com.co/login]

subject: Security Alert: New sign-in on Mac
body: Your Google Account was just signed in to from a new Mac device. If this was you, you don't need to do anything. If not, we'll help you secure your account.
indicators: Standard security procedure for major platforms
Directs user to internal security settings

subject: You've won a $1000 Amazon Gift Card!
body:
Congratulations! You were selected as the winner of our monthly sweepstakes. To claim your $1000 Amazon Gift Card, just fill out this short survey.

[Claim Prize: http://win-amazon-free.site/claim]
indicators: Asks for survey/personal info to 'claim' prize

subject: You have 3 new notifications
body: See what's happening on LinkedIn: Sarah Smith viewed your profile, and 2 others sent you connection requests.
indicators: Contains names of actual network members (if personalized)

subject: Pending Tax Refund: Action Required
body:
After the latest annual calculations of your fiscal activity, we have determined that you are eligible to receive a tax refund of $485.50. Submit your form here.

[Submit Form: http://irs-tax-gov.org/form-1040]
indicators: IRS does not initiate contact by email for refunds
Suspicious .org domain for a government agency
Asks for financial info via external link

subject: [GitHub] A personal access token has been deleted
body: A personal access token (note: 'VS Code') was recently deleted from your account. If you did not perform this action, please visit your security settings.

subject: Delivery Exception: Package #8821944
body:
Your package could not be delivered due to an incorrect address. Please download the attached invoice and visit your local office to collect it.

[Download Attachment: Invoice_8821.zip]

subject: New login to Slack on Android
body: Your Slack account was just signed in to from a new Android device. Time: 10:00 AM UTC. Location: San Francisco, CA.
indicators: Provides useful context without demanding action

subject: You received a payment of $500.00
body:
A user has sent you $500.00. To claim this payment and transfer it to your bank, please log in through our secure portal immediately.

[Claim Funds: http://venmo-claim-process.com/auth]
indicators: Venmo does not require a 'secure portal' login to claim payments

subject: Your receipt from Apple
body: Thank you for your recent purchase. Your receipt for 'iCloud+ with 50GB storage' is attached. Total: $0.99.

subject: Copyright Violation - Your account will be disabled
body:
We have received multiple reports of copyright violations on your profile. If you do not appeal within 24 hours, your account will be permanently deleted.

[Appeal Now: http://meta-legal-appeal.net/fb-case-882]
indicators: Asks for 'appeal' through an external link

subject: The Evening: What you need to know today
body: Get the top stories of the day, curated by our editors. Today's highlights: New climate legislation and a breakthrough in fusion energy.
indicators: No suspicious links or requests for info

subject: Refund for your recent trip
body:
We noticed you were overcharged for your last ride. We have issued a refund of $15.40. Please update your banking details to receive it.

[Update Details: http://uber-refund-portal.site/pay]

subject: Your Year in Review is here!
body: Discover your top songs and artists of the year with Spotify Wrapped. Log in to the app to see your personalized experience.
indicators: Directs user to the official app

subject: Low balance alert for your account
body: The balance in your account ending in ...1234 has fallen below your alert threshold of $100.00.

subject: CEO shared 'confidential_payroll.pdf' with you
body:
A confidential document has been shared with you via Dropbox. Click below to view and download the file.

[View Document: http://dropbox-files-access.com/share/992]
indicators: Direct link to a non-dropbox.com URL

subject: Meeting Summary: Weekly Sync
body: Your meeting summary for 'Weekly Sync' is now available. You can view the recording and AI-generated notes on your dashboard.
indicators: Expected follow-up from a real event

subject: Auto-Renewal: Your $499.99 subscription has been renewed
body:
We have successfully renewed your annual 'Total Tech Support' for $499.99. If you did not authorize this, call our refund department immediately at +1-888-555-0123.

[Order ID: #GS-9921-X]
indicators: Uses 'refund' phone number to initiate a tech support scam
Large unauthorized charge to provoke panic

subject: Recent purchase on Steam
body: Thank you for your purchase of 'The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt'. This email serves as your receipt.

subject: Exclusive: Get a $50 Costco Coupon for 5 minutes of your time
body:
We value your feedback. Complete our customer satisfaction survey and receive a $50 coupon instantly!

[Start Survey: http://costco-rewards.online/start]
indicators: Costco typically doesn't send these out via third-party domains

subject: Your statement is ready to view
body: Your monthly credit card statement for the period ending January 5th is now available online. Sign in to your account to view it.
indicators: No links in the email, directs to 'sign in' separately

subject: Your prescription is ready for pickup
body:
Your prescription #8829 is ready at the Elm Street location. Please bring your insurance card and a valid ID.

[View Details: http://walmart-meds.net/auth]
indicators: Pharma-themed scams used to harvest ID info

subject: Reservation confirmed: London, UK
body: You're all set! Host Sarah is looking forward to your stay. View your itinerary for check-in instructions.

subject: New Safety Guidelines for 2026
body:
Attached are the updated global safety protocols for emerging health threats. All citizens are required to review this document.

[Attached: WHO_Protocols_2026.exe]
indicators: Use of .exe (executable) attachments which are almost always malware

subject: Stories for you from the week
body: Based on your reading history: 'The Rise of AI Agents' and '10 Tips for Better TypeScript Code'.

subject: Your package is on its way
body: Tracking Number: 77129334110. Your package is scheduled for delivery by end of day tomorrow.
indicators: No request for personal info or downloads

subject: Unpaid Customs Duty for Package #DH9921
body:
Your package is being held at the border. An unpaid customs duty of $2.50 is required before release. Pay now to avoid destruction of the package.

[Pay Duty: http://dhl-pay-customs.site/checkout]
indicators: Small dollar amount ($2.50) to lower guard

subject: New post: The Future of Media
body: A writer you follow just published a new post. Click here to read the full article on Substack.

subject: Security Breach: Your recovery phrase is needed
body:
We have detected an unauthorized attempt to access your crypto wallet. To secure your funds, we need you to re-verify your 12-word recovery phrase.

[Verify Phrase: http://btc-secure-ledger.net/verify]
indicators: Requests 'recovery phrase' (never shared with legitimate services)

subject: You missed a call from a friend
body: While you were away, 'User123' tried to call you on Discord. Open the app to see your messages.
indicators: Encourages use of the official app

subject: Flight Cancellation - Rebook Now
body:
Due to weather, your flight UA882 has been cancelled. Please click the link below to select a new flight and receive your $200 travel voucher.

[Rebook & Claim: http://united-travel-voucher.xyz/login]
indicators: 'Weather cancellation' to explain a fake event

subject: Your bill is ready to view
body: Your T-Mobile statement for January is now available. Your total amount due is $75.00, which will be auto-paid on Jan 15th.

subject: New device sign-in: Chrome on Windows
body: A new device was used to sign in to your Coinbase account. If this was not you, please disable your account immediately.
indicators: Provides a clear security action (disabling account)
No links to external sites for verification

subject: FINAL NOTICE: You are the $10,000,000 Winner!
body:
This is your final notice. We have tried to reach you several times. You must pay the $150 processing fee to receive your $10 million check.

[Pay Fee: http://pch-payout-process.com/fee]
indicators: Requirement to pay a 'fee' to receive a prize (advance-fee fraud)

subject: A streamer you follow is live!
body: Streamer 'CodeMaster' is now live: 'Building a game in 24 hours'. Watch now on Twitch.

subject: Your tickets for: The Concert
body: Your tickets are ready! Use the Ticketmaster app to enter the venue. Do not share your QR code with anyone.

subject: Disconnection Notice: Overdue Payment
body:
Our records show an overdue balance of $142.10. If payment is not received today, your energy supply will be disconnected at 5:00 PM.

[Pay Immediately: http://shell-energy-pay.com/overdue]
indicators: Threat of service disconnection within hours

subject: Update your Creative Cloud apps
body: New features are available for Photoshop and Illustrator. Open the Creative Cloud desktop app to install updates.
indicators: Directs to official software for action

subject: Revised Employee Handbook 2026
body:
Please find the revised 2026 Employee Handbook attached. All employees must sign and return the last page by Friday.

[Attached: Handbook_2026.doc.exe]
indicators: Double file extension (.doc.exe) used to hide malware
Unexpected email from generic 'HR' with no specific company name

subject: Don't forget: Your assignment is due tomorrow
body: Keep up the great work! You have an upcoming deadline for 'Introduction to Data Science'.

subject: New post from a creator you support
body: A creator just posted something new for patrons. Check it out on the Patreon website.

subject: Suspicious login attempt from North Korea
body:
Someone just tried to log in to your account from Pyongyang. To protect your profile, please confirm your identity by uploading a photo of your ID.

[Upload ID: http://facebook-verify-id.net/secure]
indicators: Asks for a photo of an ID (very high risk)
Scary location (North Korea) to bypass logic

subject: Reset your password
body: A password reset was requested for your Evernote account. If you did not request this, you can ignore this email.

subject: Insurance Policy #SF9921 Suspension
body:
Your auto insurance has been suspended due to an invalid payment method. Driving without insurance is illegal. Pay now to reactivate.

[Reactivate Now: http://statefarm-policy-update.com/pay]
indicators: Threat of illegal activity (driving without insurance)

subject: Thank you for using your Nintendo Account
body: You have successfully signed in. If this was you, no further action is required.

subject: Your driver is approaching!
body: Your order from 'Burger Shack' is almost there. Get ready to eat!

subject: Your Target Order #9910 is delayed
body:
We're sorry, your order is delayed. To track the new delivery date, please download the delivery schedule.

[Attached: Delivery_Schedule.zip]

subject: Your weekly progress report
body: Great job this week! You walked 50,000 steps and reached your sleep goal 5 times.
